channel.title: Joseph Hallenbeck
channel.description: The blog of all things Joe Hallenbeck. Computer science. Cultural criticism. Philosophy. Comics. Drawing. Anything and nothing!

item.title: A Statement of Purpose
item.description:
My experience in blogging indicates that without some statement of why the blog exists or what the blog will cover the blog will gradually sink into a meandering journal of the authorâ€™s random thoughts. I know this, because I have blogs filled with my random musings. Let this one be different. Let it focus more on informing others rather than introspectively informing myself. What might you find here in future entries?

  • Announcements relating to my upcoming publications, current writings, and work.
  • A highlight of my photographs and artwork
  • Short essays on philosophy, travelogues, and art reviews

  puts 'foo'
